scripts.prepare-matic: mustache config/matic.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/matic.json src/utils/constants.template.ts > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.prepare-bsc: mustache config/bsc.json subgraph.template.yaml > subgraph.yaml && mustache config/bsc.json src/utils/constants.template.ts > src/utils/constants.ts
scripts.deploy-matic: npm run prepare-matic && graph deploy --studio liquidyhub-analytics---polygon
scripts.deploy-bsc: npm run prepare-bsc && graph deploy --studio liquidyhub-analytics---bsc
